nodes.text: Emily Shkoukani was a casting production assistant on the two-part pilot episode of Star Wars Resistance, "The Recruit," and they have since become a junior creative executive at Lucasfilm. They are a member of the Lucasfilm Story Group and a contributing writer of features on StarWars.com, including the Star Wars Inside Intel series that began on March 30, 2021. In the first episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show, they answered fans' questions.
